mapper.select: select zzim_no, z.gonggu_no, photo1, gonggu_name, price, z.create_at, (select max(location_name) from location l , parti_tb p where g.gonggu_no = p.gonggu_no and p.location_code = l.location_no) location_name from zzim z left join gonggu g on z.gonggu_no = g.gonggu_no where zzim_member = #{userId}
